sentence: As governor, Brian Kemp has repeatedly surrendered to Stacey Abrams and the Radical Left.? Trump then proceeded to bullet point reasons why Kemp was a RINO,? all of which were related to the 2020 election, which Trump lost after two recounts in Georgia by a razor-thin margin of around 12,000 votes out of nearly five million cast: Kemp allowed himself to be bullied into a disastrous consent decree that effectively abolished signature verification and allowed massive voter fraud to occur throughout the state of Georgia.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Trump Fundraises for David Perdue, Rips Georgia Gov. Kemp as Horrible RINO' over 2020 Election
